name: Redirect On First Login
author: swadeshswain

sections.description:
Suppose you have some information you want to redirect first time users to, such as a rules page, or a list of certain posts, etc. You would like to do that the first time they login as a new user. You can do with using this “Redirect ON First Login” Plugin. In this Plugin you can see how to redirect the user to the change password page if it is the first time they have logged in.

Redirect On First Login Features

  • Plugin config page
  • User can active or deactive redirect funtion from plugin config page

HOW TO USE IT

  • active the plugin option to “Yes” on plugin config page
  • Add redirect URl on config page

NOTICE

YOUR IMPORTANT FEEDBACK IS HIGHLY VALUABLE FOR US, PLEASE WRITE TO ME IF YOU HAVE ANY PROBLEM IN INSTALLATION OR YOU RECOMMEND SOME NEW FEATURE. WE WILL FIX THE ISSUE IN PRIORITY.

SUPPORT EMAIL: hello@swadeshswain.com or fill this form Feed Back Form

THANK YOU
sections.installation:
Installation of this plugin is pretty easy.

  1. Upload the extracted plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation, or upload it directly from your plugins section in the WordPress admin panel.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. That’s it!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Installation of this plugin is pretty easy.

  1. Upload the extracted plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation, or upload it directly from your plugins section in the WordPress admin panel.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. That’s it!

Getting Page Not Found on Read More button

Goto Settings -> Permalinks -> Select “Post name” Name -> Click Save Changes

https://swadeshswain.com/

If you want us to install the plugin on your wordpress page you can contact us at hello@swadeshswain.com

1.0.0

  • Initial Release
